name: github-account-switcher
title: GitHub Account Switcher
description: Switch between GitHub CLI accounts and view current account
author: himanshu_chauhan

commands.name: switch-account
commands.title: Switch GitHub Account
commands.description: Switch GitHub CLI accounts and clear cached credentials

commands.name: current-account
commands.title: Current GitHub Account
commands.description: Show current active GitHub CLI account

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
